jobs.title: Workplace Engagement Associate
jobs.description:
Workplace Engagement Associates are the key connection between our team and our clients. They are responsible for collecting accurate data and insights from teams, so our clients can make informed strategic decisions.

What you’ll do 
•	Be based in our client’s offices, collecting key information via our mobile app.
•	Respond to any direct queries from teams, escalating them to the internal property team or GoSpace Client Service Manager.
•	Identify issues for escalation to the Client Service Manager.
•	Generate client reports via our web app.
•	Train the internal team on our mobile and web app.
•	Provide account management support to the Client Service Manager.

What we’re looking for
•	Positive and outgoing, with a great work ethic and passion for outstanding client service.
•	Good verbal and written communication skills.
•	Demonstrate integrity, dependability, responsibility, accountability, and empathy.
•	Good time management and prioritisation skills.
•	Customer service and/or sales experience a plus.

Other Requirements  
•	Eligible to live and work in the UK

Compensation 
•	Salary £20,000 - £22,000 per year

About us
GoSpace is a successful, rapidly growing, UK-based start-up software company, based in the West End.
With over 5 years R&D, GoSpace is the first software of its kind to use revolutionary AI to optimise commercial real estate using dynamic resource allocation. It enables organisations to analyse how much space teams need to work efficiently and effectively, and to intelligently forecast how this may change in the future. It goes beyond just collecting data and providing analytics, to create space allocation solutions in seconds. GoSpace empowers our clients to proactively manage their office space, reducing costs and enhancing productivity across local and global real estate portfolios.
